name: Energizer 3D
description:
Sequel to the hit platformer "Energizer" for the SNES
A game made for the 32Bit Game Jam.

Energizer 3D is a 3D platformer that tries to emulate the feel and style of N64 games. Boost your way through the level and most of all, have fun.

Let us know if you managed to collect all coins ( There are 40 total)

Controls:

Action
KeyboardController (Xbox)MoveWASDLeft Stick
Jump/Aerial boost
SpaceA/Right Bumper
Boost Forward
KBPunch/Boost Backward
JXMove Camera
Arrow Keys
D-PadPause Game
EscapeStart

Controller is recommended

Note:
The game is locked at 30FPS to keep that N64 feel. If this really bothers you, you can turn it off in the settings. The camera controls can be inverted in the settings as well.
